name: Azer
description: An Azer is a humanoid creature composed of living metal and flames. Its body is made of glowing, molten brass or bronze, and its hair and beard burn with an eternal fire.
memorable: Azer's ability to channel the heat of its fiery body into powerful strikes and its role as skilled smiths who forge weapons and armor of incredible quality make it unique.
goals: To craft exceptional weapons and armor while fiercely guarding their forges and kin.
relations: Azers can often be found in the company of other fire elementals or in the Elemental Plane of Fire.
environment: Elemental Plane of Fire or locations with strong connections to fire.
strengths: Immunity to fire and poison, along with strong melee capabilities and a fiery aura that damages nearby foes.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage, which can be exploited by opponents.
attacks: The Azer strikes with a Warhammer dealing bludgeoning damage boosted by fiery damage, making it effective in combat.
most_powerful_ability: Fiery Aura, which damages any creature that ends its turn close to the Azer.
senses: Possesses a passive Perception of 11, which is average for noticing hidden threats.
skills: The Azer has average skills, with no particularly noteworthy proficiencies.
additional_information: Can teleport up to 90 feet while standing in fire.
Inflicts damage to creatures who touch it or hit it with melee attacks.
Can create a line of fire as a defensive mechanism.
Skilled in crafting, particularly weapon and armor creation.
Bears an eternal flame in its hair and beard.
spellcasting: Can cast Heat Metal, dealing fire damage to enemies holding metal items.
